column5: What kind of weather should I expect near Dryden the last week of June? Normally we go in late to mid July, so I was wondering if the weather will be significantly cooler or will it be warm. Thanks, Bassinboy

[font color=green size=3][b]Anybody's guess, some years it's cool and rainy, other years it can be near 90* and the black flys & misquitos can be bad. In fact it can be all that in the same week. The fishing is generally better early because the walleyes are feeding in the shallows.
Thanks, sounds like about the same unpredictable weather we get in July. Thanks, Bassinboy
Five day weather forecast for Dryden is available at the following link http://weatheroffice.ec.gc.ca/canada_e.html
